trends: There have been no other sightings in air base
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsken the other driver said get up. come here , look. he was driving i got out of bed and got in passenger seat. he said look over there , to my left of highway. a military jet was taking off from airbase and the a big puffy cloud was in front of the jet path... the cloud slid a panel from left to right very fast to expose a machine in the cloud the jet went up toward the cloud then banked to the left and then the cloud slid the panel back right to left. i asked ken what he saw he told me just what we saw. i was stunned. the cloud looked like a regular big puffy cloud. when the jet banked it to left it wing span fit easliy into the rectangular opening of the cloud. size wise. we watched as ken drove down the highway and the jet had left and the cloud just stayed in the air, like nothing happened. it was too far away to hear anything just observe. i remember reading that there was a patent on anti gravity machine in the 1950's. the machine had big pipes horizontally and was grayish color. like the jet. up in the utah by idaho state line area about 1 year and a half or 2 years ago. me and ken drove as team for 1 year together. sunny and big clouds around.
Summary: cloud screen moved to right to show a machine behind it. so air force jet could miss it.
